Technologies Used: Apache Spark, PySpark, Python, Jupyter Notebooks
Key Features: - Dimensionality reduction using PCA - Multiple classification algorithms comparison - Model evaluation with cross-validation - Deployed on AWS EC2
Results: Achieved XX% accuracy with Random Forest model. Full analysis available on GitHub.

title: About Me
text:
I‚Äôm a 2nd year Master‚Äôs student studying Business Analytics at Boston University, with a passion for cloud analytics, data engineering, and machine learning.



[ insert background ]



I specialize in:

Cloud Computing: Working with AWS, EC2, and cloud-based data solutions
Data Analytics: Using Spark, Python, and R for large-scale data processing
Machine Learning: Building predictive models and classification algorithms
Data Visualization: Creating interactive dashboards with Plotly and Tableau




Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, Java
Technologies: Apache Spark, AWS, GitHub, Quarto, Jupyter
Tools: VS Code, RStudio, Git
